scripts.deploy: npm run push && npm run version:stable && clasp deploy --description "Production deployment $(date)"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy && npm run trigger:install
scripts.deploy:webapp:
npm run push && echo "
🚀 Deploying web app...
" && clasp deploy --description "Web app deployment $(date)" && echo "
📱 Web app deployed successfully! Manual URL retrieval required.
"
scripts.webapp:url: echo "\n📱 Getting web app URL...\n" && clasp run getWebAppUrl
scripts.webapp:open: echo "\n🌐 Opening Apps Script project for manual web app URL retrieval...\n" && npm run open
scripts.webapp:deploy-and-open: npm run deploy:webapp && npm run webapp:open
